data.name: Elsa Bloodstone
data.description: Elsa Bloodstone is a monster-hunting aristocrat who powers up a Supernatural team.

starItems.name: Elsa Bloodstone
starItems.description: Elsa Bloodstone is a monster-hunting aristocrat who powers up a Supernatural team.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>35%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>35%</color> Piercing.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>35%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>35%</color> Piercing.

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>35%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>3</color> times for <color=#86e619>35%</color> Piercing.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>35%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>4</color> times for <color=#86e619>35%</color> Piercing.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>35%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>5</color> times for <color=#86e619>35%</color> Piercing.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary attacks

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>75%</color> Piercing + Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>5</color> times for <color=#86e619>75%</color> Piercing.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.
Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.
Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage.
Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.
Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>310%</color> damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage.
Attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>370%</color> damage, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>

1.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies this attack cannot be Blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target and adjacent targets
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> and <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally

2.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or  <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies this attack cannot be Blocked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target and adjacent targets

3.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or  <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies this attack cannot be Blocked.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target and adjacent targets

4.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>10%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or  <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies this attack cannot be Blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> and <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally

5.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>. Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>15%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or  <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies this attack cannot be Blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from any <color=#fff568>CITY</color> targets
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target and adjacent targets
This attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus

6.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>15%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies:
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from any <color=#fff568>CITY</color> targets before the attack.
 > This attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus.
 > This attack cannot be Blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target and adjacent targets
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> and <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally

7.description:
Gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>45%</color> damage per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally.

Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies:
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from any <color=#fff568>CITY</color> targets before the attack.
 > This attack gains +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus.
 > This attack cannot be Blocked.

1.description:
On Miss or on ally miss, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, attack that target for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

On enemy dodge, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance
<color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance

2.description:
On Miss or on ally miss, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, attack that target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

On enemy dodge, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance. <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Accuracy per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally

3.description:
On Miss or on ally miss, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, attack that target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.

On enemy dodge, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance. <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Accuracy per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance
<color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Crit Chance

4.description:
On Miss or on ally miss, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, attack that target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.

On enemy dodge, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance. <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Accuracy per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Accuracy per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally

5.description:
On Miss or on ally miss, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> allies, attack that target for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage.

On enemy dodge, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance. <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Crit Chance.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Accuracy per <color=#fff568>SUPERNATURAL</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK HUNTER</color> ally.
